Articles.Content: We probably should divert this side discussion to another thread, though, and let NovaSilisko continue producing his awesome parts.

You\'re right.

So, Nova, what\'s your progress on the Sensors ?

Hello Nova,

WhatÂ´s the status of your re-entry plugin?

For the hinges, r4m0n made his universal hinge part for Damnyoujapan so I figured it wasn\'t needed from me anymore.

Noooo! I like those parts and all, but they are huge and clunky, and impossible to use on probes. Please don\'t abandon yours, even if you just release your models to work with r4m0n\'s plugin, it would fit into my craft far better than damnyoujapan\'s models. Even a smaller 'Rotatron' would be incredible.
Now that there is a very real possibility that docking won\'t make it in 0.15, are you still planning on waiting to release/work on new stuff for KSP or not?
This pack is missing one thing: purpose-built equipment for manned Mun landings. After BACE v1 was put down, I have to rely on bulky fuel tanks and probe parts to get me down.
Anyone have the old BACE pack to share?

I have them on my USB key.... wait, i lost my USB key :x

If i find it, i\'ll ask Nova before

I have them on my USB key.... wait, i lost my USB key :x

If i find it, i\'ll ask Nova before

I got it! Im gonna ask Nova before i attach but if it gets approved the DL will be here.

No need to upload it, the original BACE thread is still around:

Here you go.
Thanks.

BACE 0.3(1) released - now ACTUALLY with moon landing gear and solar panels.

Download:

Requires 0.14+

Dropbox

Mediafire
Excellent.
Fixed the download, forgot the plugin file last time...

Finally! Thanks Nova!

Edit: What controls to use for the solar panels? The part.cfg doesn\'t help. Also, the fuel tanks seem to not function for me with the BACE fuel tanks given! Thank you!

Finally! Thanks Nova!

Edit: What controls to use for the solar panels? The part.cfg doesn\'t help. Also, the fuel tanks seem to not function for me with the BACE fuel tanks given! Thank you!

Oops, that fuel tank shouldn\'t be in there.

Solar panels activate when you activate the stage. The legs extend and retract with the RCS translate forward/backward keys (only if the RCS itself is off)

I don\'t think the solar panels work as intended, Nova. They don\'t stay unfolded when the vessel is unloaded and reloaded (such as when resuming a saved game). When the vessel is loaded they start out in the folded position and immediately start unfolding.

IMO the Probodyne panels controlled by their own button work better. At least they stay up across multiple sessions.
Sounds like a basic persistence saving fail. If they are based on their own plugin, states must be saved in the way the PowerSat does.
Do the new legs save their state?
Yeah, they do.
! New engines are solid icon/ liquid fuel with no need for fuel!?!
I have no idea.
Yes, the landing engines have a solid fuel icon, but are 'single-use liquid landing engines.'

This is consistent with the landing rockets used by space probes and upper stages of some rockets. They can only be ignited once, but they are liquid fueled, so not all propellant needs to be used and 'custom' flightpaths can be obtained.
They\'re liquid engines with a built-in fuel supply, I forgot to change their icons.
